alert.note: Alert for Northwest Providence; Southeast Providence (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 12:24PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Heavy rainfall will impact portions of northwestern Bristol and central Providence Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1221 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking heavy rain over Glocester, or 8 miles northwest of Johnston, moving east at 15 mph. Rainfall rates up to one inch per hour are expected. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Providence, Cranston, Pawtucket, East Providence, Woonsocket, Cumberland, North Providence, Johnston, North Attleborough, Attleboro, Smithfield, Lincoln, Central Falls, Burrillville, North Smithfield, Scituate, Glocester and Foster. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.
